def: The act of acclimating, or the state of being acclimated. [R.]Caldwell.
A labiate plant (Teucrium Scordium) found in marshy places inEurope.
One who, or that which, reproves.

One of an Oriental religious sect which worships Satan or theDevil.The Izedis or Yezdis, the so-called Devil worshipers, still remain anumerous though oppressed people in Mesopotamia and adjacentcountries. Tylor.
Derived from castor oil; ricinoleic; as, elaiodic acid. [R.]
To create or form anew.On opening the campaign of 1776, instead of reÃ«nforcing, it wasnecessary to re-create, the army. Marshall.
Taking place in the open air; outdoor; as, an open-air game ormeeting.
Yielding gelatin on boiling with water; capable ofgelatination.
In every place; in all places; hence, in every part; throughly;altogether.
The act of compressing, or state of being compressed."Compression of thought." Johnson.
The act of clearing from spots. [Obs.] Johnson.
